ActDepartment of Veterans Affairs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Veterans Health Care Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VETERANS HEALTH CARE REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide clarity to stakeholders and ensure continued authority to pay for care of eligible Veterans in the Hospital; and (2) alleviate any undue emotional and financial hardship for Veterans as a result of the differences in accommodations and meals (A&M) billing practices by eliminating the need for these Veterans to pay two monthsâ€™ worth of A&M at the same time.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0031 Publication Date: 2016-03-09
